name: Trinity Survivors
description:
Trinity Survivors introduces an innovative form of action roguelite gameplay, featuring the strategic combination of three distinct characters in combat. Confront lots of different enemies and utilize a wide range of skills to prevail in combat. Experience the evolving strength of each character, enabling you to conquer increasingly challenging levels and achieve higher scores. Use the rewards earned in combat to unlock new characters, enhance your abilities, and collect valuable loot. An endless series of new challenges is always waiting for you to tackle.

Create Your Own Trinity Tactics


- Each character possesses unique leader skills and abilities.
- Combine three types of skills — melee, ranged, and AoE — and collect artifacts to further enhance their capabilities.

Unite in Two-Player Co-op Multiplayer


- Play cooperatively online with your Steam friends and other Steam users.
- There's no friendly fire and you won't interfere with each others' combat. Join forces to defeat your enemies.
